components.appName: The VA Precision Oncology Data Commons

introduction.heading: VA Data Commons
introduction.text: The VA Data Commons supports the management, analysis and sharing of US military veteran oncologic data for the research communityand aims to accelerate discovery and development of therapies, diagnostic tests, and other technologies for precision oncology. The data commons supports cross-project analyses by harmonizing data from different projects through the collaborative development of a data dictionary, providing an API for data queries, and providing a cloud-based analysis workspace with rich tools and resources.

buttons.name: Define Data Field
buttons.body: The VA Data Commons defines the data in a general way. Please study the dictionary before you start browsing.
buttons.label: Learn more

buttons.name: View/Submit Data
buttons.body: View or submit data to a project.
buttons.label: Submit data

buttons.name: Access Data
buttons.body: Use our selected tool to filter out the data you need.
buttons.label: Query data

buttons.name: Analyze Data
buttons.body: Analyze your selected cases using Jupyter Notebooks in our secure cloud environment
buttons.label: Run analysis
